metadata.creator: Nintendo EAD
metadata.description:
Animal Crossing: Happy Home Paradise (どうぶつの森 ハッピーホームパラダイス)

Officially titled: Animal Crossing: New Horizons - Happy Home Paradise (あつまれ どうぶつの森 ハッピーホームパラダイス) as it is a DLC for New Horizons.

DeveloperNintendo EAD
Original release2021-11-05
PlatformNintendo Switch
ComposersYasuaki Iwata, Yumi Takahashi, Shinobu Nagata, Sayako Doi, Masato Ohashi


This is a collection of all music from Animal Crossing: Happy Home Paradise for the Nintendo Switch. The music was ripped from the game's internal audio files and converted to FLAC/MP3, then ordered and tagged.

When new versions of the game come out and add new music tracks, this soundtrack rip will be updated.

Download as rar:

  • Animal Crossing - Happy Home Paradise (2021) (Nintendo EAD) [FLAC].rar (786.0M)
  • Animal Crossing - Happy Home Paradise (2021) (Nintendo EAD) [MP3].rar (324.7M)

See also:

  • Animal Crossing: New Leaf - OST
  • Animal Crossing: New Horizons - OST

Released on 2022-03-27 by dada78641.
